relations_established: Total squared error from stable walkers is bounded
natural_language_statement: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states with $|\mathcal{A}(\mathcal{S}_1)|=k_1 \ge 2$. The total squared error in the expected raw distance from the set of stable walkers, $\mathcal{A}_{\text{stable}} = \mathcal{A}(\mathcal{S}_1) \cap \mathcal{A}(\mathcal{S}_2)$, is bounded as follows:
